name: My Saturday Grounded
description:
Tim is grounded this Saturday. But his mom is heading out to see someone. Maybe this means Tim can sneak out and see someone too...

Made for GBJAM 9, before I realized it didn't follow the rules for this particular jam.

Art, Code, Game - Tustin2121
Music - krümel (crumb)

Keyboard Controls
Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Changelog

  • v1 - Initial release (with known bugs, for game jam)
  • v2 - Lots of bug fixes and finishing patched over story and missing ending for the "Playground" line. Also adjusting story dialog and timing.
